vitality.translation[0].definitions[0].d: great energy and eagerness to do things
vitality.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Despite her eighty years, Elsie was full of vitality.
vitality.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the strength and ability of an organization, country etc to continue
vitality.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The process of restructuring has injected some much-needed vitality into the company.
The senator promised to restore the economic vitality of the region.
